name: Psychic Projector
passive: Psychic Blast: Abilities that deal damage to enemy champions fire a projectile at the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage (4 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Ability Power, Ability Haste, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Abilities that deal damage to enemy champions fire a projectile at the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage (4 second cooldown).. A versatile item that can benefit many champion types.
tips: Perfect for champions who rely heavily on abilities
The cooldown reduction/ability haste maximizes spell uptime
Synergizes well with champions who have low cooldowns
